title: Remote Health Monitoring Dashboard
summary: As a caregiver, I want to access a comprehensive dashboard that displays real-time health metrics for older adults so that I can effectively monitor their well-being.

title: Health Data Alert Customization
summary: As a Health IT Compliance Officer, I want caregivers to customize alert settings for health metrics so that they receive notifications tailored to specific health concerns while ensuring compliance with data privacy regulations.

title: Care Task Progress Tracking
summary: As a caregiver, I want to track the progress of care tasks assigned to older adults so that I can ensure timely completion and accountability.

title: Secure User Consent Management
summary: As a health IT compliance officer, I want ALFRED to provide a mechanism for older adults to manage and revoke consent for data sharing so that I can ensure compliance with privacy regulations and protect patient trust.

title: Quick Access to Emergency Information
summary: As a caregiver, I want quick access to emergency contact information and critical health data so that I can respond effectively in urgent situations.

title: Integrated Communication Tools for Caregivers
summary: As a Health IT Compliance Officer, I want integrated communication tools for caregivers within ALFRED so that they can effectively interact with older adults while ensuring compliance with data privacy regulations.
